data.lyric:
[ti:SLOW DANCING IN THE DARK]
[ar:Joji]
[al:SLOW DANCING IN THE DARK]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]SLOW DANCING IN THE DARK - Joji
[00:07.47]Lyrics by：Joji
[00:14.95]Composed by：Joji/Patrick Wimberly
[00:22.43]I don't want a friend
[00:25.63]I want my life in two
[00:31.37]Waiting to get there
[00:36.68]Waiting for you
[00:39.62]I'm done fighting all night
[00:45.80]When I'm around slowdancing in the dark
[00:51.24]Don't follow me you'll end up in my arms
[00:55.89]You done made up your mind
[00:58.55]I don't need no more signs
[01:01.28]Can you
[01:03.98]Can you
[01:07.71]Give me reasons we should be complete
[01:13.07]You should be with him I can't compete
[01:18.21]You looked at me like I was someone else
[01:23.58]Oh well
[01:25.24]Can't you see
[01:30.50]I don't wanna slow dance
[01:36.00]In the dark
[01:42.72]Dark
[01:48.73]When you gotta run
[01:51.73]Just hear my voice in you
[01:57.38]Shutting me out you
[02:02.83]Doing so great
[02:06.68]Yeah
[02:11.03]Used to be the one to hold you when you fall
[02:17.09]Yea yea yea
[02:19.57]I don't f**k with your tone
[02:22.24]I don't wanna go home
[02:24.92]Can it be one night
[02:27.45]Can you
[02:30.23]Can you
[02:33.97]Give me reasons we should be complete
[02:39.30]You should be with him I can't compete
[02:44.52]You looked at me like I was someone else
[02:49.89]Oh well
[02:51.59]Can't you see
[02:56.89]I don't wanna slow dance
[03:02.26]In the dark
[03:08.96]Dark
[03:13.13]In the dark
[03:19.79]Dark
data.trans:
[ti:SLOW DANCING IN THE DARK]
[ar:Joji]
[al:SLOW DANCING IN THE DARK]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:07.47]//
[00:14.95]//
[00:22.43]我不想要朋友
[00:25.63]我想要和你相守一生
[00:31.37]期待着那一天
[00:36.68]等待着你
[00:39.62]我厌倦了彻夜争吵
[00:45.80]当我在黑暗中慢慢跳着舞时
[00:51.24]别跟着我 不然我会把你拥入怀中
[00:55.89]你已下定决心
[00:58.55]我不需要什么暗示
[01:01.28]你能否
[01:03.98]你能否
[01:07.71]给我一个理由 让我们跳完这支舞
[01:13.07]你应该和他在一起 我无法与你相比
[01:18.21]你看着我时 应该把我当成别人
[01:23.58]//
[01:25.24]你不知道吗
[01:30.50]我不想在黑暗中
[01:36.00]慢慢跳舞
[01:42.72]黑暗
[01:48.73]当你准备逃离时
[01:51.73]你在脑子里听到我的声音
[01:57.38]把我彻底忘掉
[02:02.83]如此决绝
[02:06.68]//
[02:11.03]从前我也会在你失落时安慰你
[02:17.09]//
[02:19.57]我不在乎你说什么
[02:22.24]我不想回家
[02:24.92]跟我呆一个晚上可以吗
[02:27.45]你能否
[02:30.23]你能否
[02:33.97]给我一个理由 让我们跳完这支舞
[02:39.30]你应该和他在一起 我无法与你相比
[02:44.52]你看着我时 应该把我当成别人
[02:49.89]//
[02:51.59]你不知道吗
[02:56.89]我不想在黑暗中
[03:02.26]慢慢跳舞
[03:08.96]黑暗
[03:13.13]在黑暗中
[03:19.79]黑暗
